reviewText: I LOVE "The Lawrence Welk Show", especially the black and white years.  The three shows in this collection were from 1960, 1962, and 1963.  They were live shows, taken from kinescopes, but the quality is pretty good!  My only complaint is that the commercials have been edited out, and the cuts are a bit abrupt, and thee were a few jumps in the picture.  The shows on this DVD are WAY better than the newer color shows that are shown ad nauseum on PBS.The Lennon Sisters, Barbara and Bobby, Bob Lido, Aladdin, Dick Dale, Rocky Rockwell, Jerry Burke, Frank Scott, Larry Hooper, Joann Castle, Jack Imel, and the rest of Lawrence's fine orchestra and cast are on this collection.If you're a Lawrence Welk fan, or just like good wholesome TV and music, order this DVD!
Title: 3 Classic Episodes of the Lawrence Welk Show

reviewText: Couldnt understand what makes these classic. Same fare. Same cast only younger. Lawrence's accent was not as evident in these earlier videos. Interesting.
Title: 3 Classic Episodes of the Lawrence Welk Show

reviewText: Streamed these for my elderly mother to watch and they are 3 very early, really classic episodes.Mom really enjoyed them, so I'm giving them a 5 star rating.
Title: 3 Classic Episodes of the Lawrence Welk Show

reviewText: This was a walk down memory lane for me. Every Saturday night we had our hair in rollars and watched the Lawrence Welk Show. The Lennon Sisters were my favorite. I always wanted to play piano after seeing JoAnn Castle. I am happy to be able to see a show I watched as a kid.
Title: 3 Classic Episodes of the Lawrence Welk Show

reviewText: I purchased this as a gift to my mother-in-law, a dyed in the wool Welk fan!  She said that she loved it.
summary: Visit your favorite moment in entertainment
Title: 3 Classic Episodes of the Lawrence Welk Show

reviewText: This DVD brings the best of Lawrence Welk back to family that were his fans.  The shows were always well done and enjoyable and it is nice to see them again.
Title: 3 Classic Episodes of the Lawrence Welk Show
